title: The Echo Reset
story_summary: The BCI system suddenly erases itself overnight. Halden's last words appear everywhere. People gather in confusion to read his messages. The city grows louder with debates and colorful murals. With no scores to follow, the Council fades away and neighbors start deciding for themselves what happens next.

official.headline: System Refresh Begins
official.anchor_line: Citywide BCI updates have begun, displaying inspirational Echoes for all residents.
official.contextual_reframing: Transitions ensure optimal service continuity. Residents are encouraged to engage constructively as systems evolve.

official.headline: Community Dialogue Grows
official.anchor_line: Residents experience new collaborative spaces as public discussion enriches Stenograd's civic spirit.
official.contextual_reframing: Open dialogue facilitates resilience and unity, supporting collective improvement across neighborhoods.

official.headline: Orderly Transition Complete
official.anchor_line: Stenograd embraces a new chapter as the BCI system is retired and communities guide daily stewardship.
official.contextual_reframing: Systemic adaptation highlights Stenograd's ongoing commitment to progress and harmonious coexistence.

underground.headline: Scores Wiped Out
underground.anchor_line: Every BCI screen has gone dark. All that's left are cryptic Echoes and rumors Halden triggered the reset himself.
underground.contextual_reframing: What happens when your life score is deleted overnight? Stenograd is raw and exposed. The system finally blinked.

underground.headline: Unfiltered Voices Rise
underground.anchor_line: Without BCI dictating status, neighbors actually talk. Some ask what was real. Others demand the truth.
underground.contextual_reframing: No more silent corridors. Forums, street corners, even kitchens become battlegrounds for memory and meaning.

underground.headline: Council Power Melts
underground.anchor_line: While the Council hides, people gather, question, and reclaim the city. Authority slips away as murals replace rankings.
underground.contextual_reframing: This is not chaos. This is Stenograd finally waking up. You are more than your score.
